Uses of Class
software.leonov.cells.util.StyleBuilder

  • Packages that use StyleBuilder 
    Package Description
    software.leonov.cells.util
    Static utilities and helper methods.

    • Uses of StyleBuilder in software.leonov.cells.util

      Methods in software.leonov.cells.util that return StyleBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.clear()
      Clears all settings from this builder, returning it to its initial state.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.newStyleBuilder()
      Returns a new StyleBuilder instance populated with the current properties of this StyleBuilder.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setAlignment(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.HorizontalAlignment align)
      Sets the type of horizontal alignment.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setBorder(BorderSide side, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.BorderStyle border)
      Sets the type of border to use for the specified BorderSide of the cell.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setBorder(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.BorderStyle border)
      Sets the type of border to use for the entire cell (top/bottom/right/left).
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setBorderColor(BorderSide side, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors color)
      Sets the color to use for the specified BorderSide of the cell.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setBorderColor(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors color)
      Sets the color to use for the border of the entire cell (top/right/bottom/left).
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setDataFormat(short fmt)
      Sets the data format (must be a valid format).
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setFillBackgroundColor(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors color)
      Sets the background fill color.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setFillForegroundColor(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors color)
      Sets the foreground fill color.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setFillPattern(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.FillPatternType fp)
      Sets the fill pattern of the cell.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setFont(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Font font)
      Sets the font for this style.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setHidden(boolean hidden)
      Sets the cells using this style to be hidden.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setIndention(short indent)
      Set the number of spaces to indent the text in the cell.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setLocked(boolean locked)
      Sets the cells using this style to be locked.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setQuotePrefixed(boolean treatAsText)
      Sets whether or not Microsoft Excel should treat the cell value as text even if it can be parsed as a number or a formula.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setRotation(short rotation)
      Sets the degree of rotation for the text in the cell.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setShrinkToFit(boolean shrinkToFit)
      Sets whether or not the cell should auto-sized to fit its contents.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setSolidFillColor(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors color)
      Sets the foreground fill color and applies a solid foreground fill pattern.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setVerticalAlignment(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.VerticalAlignment align)
      Sets the type of vertical alignment.
      StyleBuilder StyleBuilder.setWrapText(boolean wrapped)
      Sets whether the text should be wrapped.
